K10D0244_H0245:41a-20: btson rar chud par yang bya ba ni /
K10D0244_H0245:41a-21: bsam bzhin du skye ba rnams su'o //
K10D0244_H0245:41a-22: pha rol tu phyin par yang bya ba ni /
K10D0244_H0245:41a-23: sems can thams cad kyi skad shes pa la'o //
K10D0244_H0245:41a-24: chu bo chen po'i nang na gnas par yang bya ba ni /
K10D0244_H0245:41a-25: chu bo bzhis khyer ba'i sems can sgrol ba'i phyir te /
K10D0244_H0245:41a-30: tshad yod pa la'ang so sor rtog par gyis shig /
K10D0244_H0245:41a-31: tshad med par yang mnyam pa nyid du khong du chud par gyis shig /
K10D0244_H0245:41a-35: byang chub sems dpa' rnams tshad mchis pa la'ang so sor rtog pa lags /
K10D0244_H0245:41a-37: tshad ma mchis pa la'ang mnyam pa nyid du khong du chud par bgyid pa lags /
K10D0244_H0245:41a-38: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0244_H0245:41a-40: tshad yod pa zhes bya ba ni /
K10D0244_H0245:41b-0: 'dus @41b byas so; ;tshad med pa zhes bya ba ni /
K10D0244_H0245:41b-2: de la byang chub sems dpas 'dus byas kyang spang bar mi bya ste /
K10D0244_H0245:41b-3: 'dus byas su gtogs pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams dang yang 'grogs par mi bya'o //
K10D0244_H0245:41b-4: 'dus ma byas la'ang brtag par bya ste /
K10D0244_H0245:41b-5: skyon med par yang 'jug par mi bya'o //
K10D0244_H0245:41b-6: 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas gcig pa'i mtshan nyid
K10D0244_H0245:41b-7: dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis byang chub kyi snying
K10D0244_H0245:41b-8: por mnyam pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par sangs
K10D0244_H0245:41b-12: tshul gyi tshig 'di dag bstan pa'i tshe lha'i bu brgyad stong ni /
K10D0244_H0245:41b-13: byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to //
K10D0244_H0245:41b-14: byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya ni /
K10D0244_H0245:41b-15: mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to //
K10D0244_H0245:41b-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas
K10D0244_H0245:41b-17: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu
K10D0244_H0245:41b-22: dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste bcom
K10D0244_H0245:41b-23: ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do;
K10D0244_H0245:41b-24: ;'phags pa chos kyi tshul zhes bya ba theg pa
K10D0244_H0245:41b-26: rgya gar gyi mkhan po bra dzny'a warma dang /
K10D0244_H0245:41b-27: zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba bandhe ye shes sde la sogs pas sgyur cing /
